Package info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules

Various types of grammar rules (e.g.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GrammarRule<T extends Token> A basic grammar rule for a monolingual or transduction parser.
RuleFactory<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token> A means for handling on-the-fly creation of dummy rules for terminal symbols during the parsing process and for defining how partial parse output should be formatted for use in debugging.
 

Class Summary
MonoCFGRule<T extends Token> A monolingual version of a Context-Free GrammarRule.
MonoCFGRuleFactory<T extends Token> A means for handling on-the-fly creation of dummy rules for terminal symbols during the parsing process and for defining how partial parse output should be formatted for use in debugging for MonoCFGRules.
SyncCFGRule<T extends Token> A synchronous version of a Context-Free GrammarRule.
SyncCFGRuleFactory<T extends Token> A means for handling on-the-fly creation of dummy rules for terminal symbols during the parsing process and for defining how partial parse output should be formatted for use in debugging for SyncCFGRules.
 

Package info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules Description

Various types of grammar rules (e.g. CFG, SCFG, TSG)
